name: Diaper Zombies
description:
It finally happened. The Zombie apocalypse foretold by every other science fiction dystopian book and video game is here and now with it spreading across the globe, shit just got real. Literally. When someone starts turning Zombie they begin uncontrollably crapping their pants. It caused everyone to start wearing diapers during their uncomfortable transition into full Zombie mode.

Defend yourself to your last breath. Dodge exploding crap. Blow everything up.

Goals

Survive the apocalypse

Controls

Move: WASD

Shoot: Left Mouse

Dash: Spacebar

Creators

Garrett Hoofman - http://ghoofman.com

James Driessche - http://jimblyart.com
